plot: Alma Ortiz suffers from PT SD after returning from Iraq. She travels to a shady bar to confront Frank, a fellow soldier who raped her while on her tour of duty.
title: Road to Esperanza
plot_es: Alma Ortiz suffers from PT SD after returning from Iraq. She travels to a shady bar to confront Frank, a fellow soldier who raped her while on her tour of duty.
plot_en: Alma Ortiz suffers from PT SD after returning from Iraq. She travels to a shady bar to confront Frank, a fellow soldier who raped her while on her tour of duty.
